dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Maysonet [mailto:adam@sourcetv.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2005 2:51 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement

Hello,

One of your customers, http://www.bulletinboardforum.com, has stolen
copyrighted content from one of my web properties, http://www.gamelinks.com.
He has taken and modified my design without my express approval.

You can see via archives that http://www.gamelinks.com was around with the
current design much longer than the hacked design at
http://www.bulletinboardforum.com. I also can get you in contact with the
designer of www.gamelinks.com, plus I have original Photoshop files of the
design used, and my logo is featured on Elance.com under the designer's
portfolio (to give further proof of who the web designer was, who in turn
can prove that this was designed solely for me).

Any help in this matter (such as contacting the owner of
http://www.bulletinboardforum.com and notifying him of this) would be
appreciated.

Regards,
Adam Maysonet
